definition: willingness/would rather (agree to X than Y)
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do

sentences.english: China stands ready to earnestly implement the agreement together with Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與越方共同努力，認真落實協議。

sentences.english: May Amma Bhagavan's blessing bring love and joy into your Relationships.
sentences.chinese: 願阿媽和巴格萬的祝福把愛和喜悅帶入你的關係之中。

sentences.english: Ihope I didn't wake you up so early.
sentences.chinese: 我盼願這麼早沒有吵到你。

sentences.english: Rest in peace Steve and thanks for everything.
sentences.chinese: 感謝喬布斯所做的一切，願他安息。

sentences.english: My name be buried where my body is.
sentences.chinese: 願我的名字永遠和肉體同埋。

sentences.english: May the joy of the Sping Festival be with you throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 願新春佳節的喜悅，伴隨您度過新的一年。

sentences.english: But Anthea spent a lot of time thinking about what to wish for.
sentences.chinese: 可安西婭花了很多時間想她該許些什麼願。

sentences.english: I think many people are willing to see, the Poyang Lake, is also not because other.
sentences.chinese: 我想，許多人是願見到鄱湖的，也並不因爲其他。

sentences.english: The Chinese side would like to work together with Arab states to compose a new chapter of China-Arab friendly cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與阿方共同努力，譜寫中阿友好合作的新篇章。

sentences.english: Littleness and glory are the choices open to your striving and your vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 你究竟願爲卑微或爲榮耀而警醒奮鬥，完全操之於你。

sentences.english: China is willing to further strengthen coordination and cooperation with Thailand in this regard.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，我們也願與泰方進一步加強協調與合作。

sentences.english: May his children be wandering beggars; may they be driven from their ruined homes.
sentences.chinese: 願他的兒女漂流討飯，從他們荒涼之處出來求食。

sentences.english: I want to pray to God with my utmost sincere heart and I am willing to sacrifice my life to plead God for rain.
sentences.chinese: 我要用最虔誠的心向天神禱告，願捨身祈求上天降雨。

sentences.english: I didn't know what he prayed but I had thought in my mind .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他許了什麼願，但我在頭腦裏有想法。

sentences.english: You are god give our persent.

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
